Diagnosis.label: T0 Neurologist assigned explanation of symptoms by organic disease

T0_HADSQ1.label: T0 HADS Q1 - I feel tense or wound up

T0_HADSQ2.label: T0 HADS Q2 - I still enjoy the things I used to enjoy

T0_HADSQ3.label: T0 HADS Q3 - I get a sort of frightened feeling as if something awful is about to happen
valuelabels: A little, but it doesn't worry me

T0_HADSQ4.label: T0 HADS Q4 - I can laugh and see the funny side of things
valuelabels: As much as I always could

T0_HADSQ5.label: T0 HADS Q5 - Worrying thoughts go through my mind
valuelabels: From time to time, but not too often
A great deal of the time

T0_HADSQ6.label: T0 HADS Q6 - I feel cheerful

T0_HADSQ7.label: T0 HADS Q7 - I can sit at ease and feel relaxed

T0_HADSQ8.label: T0 HADS Q8 - I feel as if I am slowed down

T0_HADSQ9.label: T0 HADS Q9 - I get a sort of frightened feeling like butterflies in the stomach

T0_HADSQ10.label: T0 HADS Q10 - I have lost interest in my appearance
valuelabels: I take just as much care as ever
I may not take quite as much care
I don't take as much care as I should

T0_HADSQ11.label: T0 HADS Q11 - I feel restless as if I have to be on the move

T0_HADSQ12.label: T0 HADS Q12 - I look forward with enjoyment to things
valuelabels: As much as I ever did
Rather less than I used to
Definitely less than I used to

T0_HADSQ13.label: T0 HADS Q13 - I get sudden feelings of panic

T0_HADSQ14.label: T0 HADS Q14 - I can enjoy a good book or radio or TV programme

T0_Paininarmslegsjoints.label: T0 PHQ15 Q3 - Pain in your arms, legs or joints (Knees, hips, etc)

T0_Menstrualpain.label: ***NOT USED T0 PHQ15 Q4 - Menstrual pain or problems***

T0_HeartPoundingorRacing.label: T0 PHQ15 Q9 - Feeling your heart pound or race

T0_ShortnessofBreath.label: T0 PHQ15 Q10 - Shortness of breath

T0_ProblemsIntercourse.label: ***NOT USED T0 PHQ15 Q11 - Pain on Sexual Intercourse***

T0_Constipation.label: T0 PHQ15 Q12 - Constipation, loose bowels or diarrhoea

T0_NauseaorGas.label: T0 PHQ15 Q13 - Nausea, gas or indigestion

T0_Tired.label: T0 PHQ15 Q14 - Feeling tired or having low energy

T0_Lackofcoordination.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 1 - Lack of co-ordination or balance

T0_MemorConcentration.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 2 - Problems with your memory or concentration

T0_LossofSensation.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 3 - Loss of sensation, numbness or tingling

T0_LossofVision.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 4 - Partial or total loss of vision

T0_LossofHearing.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 5 - Partial or total loss of hearing

T0_Paralysisorweakness.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 6 - Paralysis or weakness of an arm or leg

T0_DoubleorBlurredVision.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 7 - Double or blurred vision

T0_DifficultySwallowing.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 8 - Difficulty swallowing or a lump in the throat

T0_DifficultySpeaking.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 9 - Difficulty speaking or slurred speech

T0_SeizureorFit.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 10 - A seizure or fit

T0_AnxietyattackorPanicAttack.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 11/PRIME MD Q1 - An anxiety attack (suddenly feeling fear or panic)

T0_Littleinterestorpleasure.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 12/PRIME MD Q2 - Little interest or pleasure in doing things

T0_Feelingdownorhopeless.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 13/PRIME MD Q3 - Feeling down, depressed or hopeless

T0_Nervesorfeelinganxious.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 14/PRIME MD Q4 -'Nerves' or feeling anxious or on edge

T0_Worryingalot.label: T0 Neurological Symptom 15/PRIME MD Q5 - Worrying about a lot of different things

T0_SF12Q1.label: T0 SF12 Q1 (General Health 1) - In general would you say your health is...

T0_SF12Q2.label: T0 SF12 Q2 (Vitality 2) - In the past 4 weeks did you have a lot of energy?
valuelabels: A good bit of the time

T0_SF12Q3.label: T0 SF12 Q3 (Bodily Pain 2) - During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work or housework?

T0_SF12Q4.label: T0 SF12 Q4 (Physical Functioning 2) - Does your health now limit you in moderate activities such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner or playing golf?

T0_SF12Q5.label: T0 SF12 Q5 (Role Physical 2) - In the last 4 weeks have you accomplished less than you would like at work as a result of your physical health?

T0_SF12Q6.label: T0 SF12 Q6 (Role Emotional 2) - In the last 4 weeks have you accomplished less than you would like at work as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious)?

T0_SF12Q7.label: T0 SF12 Q7 (Mental Health 4) - In the last 4 weeks have you felt downhearted and low?
valuelabels: A good bit of the time

T0_SF12Q8.label: T0 SF12 Q8 (Mental Health 3) - In the last 4 weeks have you felt calm and peaceful?
valuelabels: A good bit of the time

T0_SF12Q9.label: T0 SF12 Q9 (Social Functioning 2) - In the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activites (like visiting friends, relatives etc.)?

T0_SF12Q10.label: T0 SF12 Q10 (Physical Functioning 4) - Does your health now limit you in climbing several flights of stairs?

T0_SF12Q11.label: T0 SF12 Q11 (Role Physical 3) - In the last 4 weeks have you been limited in the work you could do as a result of your physical health?

T0_SF12Q12.label: T0 SF12 Q12 (Role Emotional 3) - In the last 4 weeks have you not done work or other activities as carefully as usual as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious)?

T0_SF12_NormedMCS.label: T0 SF12 Normalised Mental Component Summary

T0_SF12_NormedPCS.label: T0 SF12 Normalised Physical Component Summary

T0_IPQ1.label: T0 IPQ Q1 - My symptoms are likely to be permanent rather than temporary

T0_IPQ2.label: T0 IPQ Q2 - Nothing I do will affect my symptoms

T0_IPQ3.label: T0 IPQ Q3 - My symptoms are a mystery to me

T0_IPQ4.label: T0 IPQ Q4 - I get angry when I think about my symptoms

T0_IPQ5.label: T0 IPQ Q5 - When I think about my symptoms I get upset

T0_IPQ6.label: T0 IPQ Q6 - My doctor understands the cause of my symptoms

T0_Wserious.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Do you think there is something seriously wrong with your body?

T0_Wworry.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Do you worry a lot about your health?

T0_Wbelieve.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Is it hard for you to believe the doctor when he tells you there is nothing to worry about?

T0_Wseriousworry.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Do you often worry about the possibility that you have a serious illness?

T0_Wpain.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Are you bothered by many different aches and pains?

T0_Wattention.label: T0 Whiteley Index - If a disease is brought to your attention (e.g. on TV, radio, in the newspapers or by someone you know), do you worry about getting it yourself?

T0_Wsymptoms.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Do you find that you are bothered by many different symptoms?

T0_Inemployment.label: T0 Socioeconomic - Are you in paid employment at the moment?

T0_Onsickleave.label: T0 Socioeconomic - If not employed are you on sick leave?

T0_Notinemploymentbecauseofillhealth.label: T0 Socioeconomic - If not employed is this due to ill health?

T0_Employmentbenefitorincomesupp.label: T0 Socioeconomic - Are you currently receiving employment benefit or income support?

T0_IncapacityBenefitorDLA.label: T0 Socioeconomic - Are you currently receiving incapacity benefit or disability living allowance?

T0_Sat2.label: T0 Satisfaction - The thoroughness, carefulness and competence of the doctor you saw?

T0_Sat3.label: T0 Satisfaction - The personal manner (courtesy, respect, sensitivity, friendliness) of the doctor you saw?

T0_Sat4.label: T0 Satisfaction - The length of time you waited between being referred by your doctor and seeing the neurologist today?

T0_Sat5.label: T0 Satisfaction - Length of time spent waiting at the clinic today?

T0_Sat6.label: T0 Satisfaction - Convenience of the location of the clinic?

T0_Sat7.label: T0 Satisfaction - Time spent with the doctor you saw?

T0_Sat8.label: T0 Satisfaction - Explanation given to you about the cause of your symptoms?

T2_Wworry.label: T2(12 months) Whiteley Index - Do you worry a lot about your health?

T2_Wbelieve.label: T2(12 months) Whiteley Index - Is it hard for you to believe the doctor when he tells you there is nothing to worry about?

T2_Wseriousworry.label: T2(12 months) Whiteley Index - Do you often worry about the possibility that you have a serious illness?

T2_Wpain.label: T2(12 months) Whiteley Index - Are you bothered by many different aches and pains?

T2_Wattention.label: T2(12 months) Whiteley Index - If a disease is brought to your attention (e.g. on TV, radio, in the newspapers or by someone you know), do you worry about getting it yourself?

T2_Wsymptoms.label: T2(12 months) Whiteley Index - Do you find that you are bothered by many different symptoms?

T2_Sat1.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - The visit overall?

T2_Sat2.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - The thoroughness, carefulness and competence of the doctor you saw?

T2_Sat3.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - The personal manner (courtesy, respect, sensitivity, friendliness) of the doctor you saw?

T2_Sat4.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - The length of time you waited between being referred by your doctor and seeing the neurologist today?

T2_Sat5.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - Length of time spent waiting at the clinic today?

T2_Sat6.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - Convenience of the location of the clinic?

T2_Sat7.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - Time spent with the doctor you saw?

T2_Sat8.label: T2(12 months) Satisfaction - Explanation given to you about the cause of your symptoms?

T2Data.label: T2(12 months) Follow up data available (T2_Retention>0 & T2_Retention<4)

All.label: Dummy group variable to denote all patients included

T0_NegExpectation.label: T0 IPQ1 - Agree or Strongly agree (>3)

T0_IllnessWorry.label: T0 Whiteley Index - Sum of (T0_Wserious, T0_Wseriousworry, T0_Wattention)

T0_PsychAttribution.label: T0 Causal Attribution - Strongly agree or agree to stress & worry or emotional factors (df['T0_C7'] > 3) | (df['T0_C8'] > 3)

T0_LackofPsychAttribution.label: T0 Causal Attribution - Strongly agree or agree to stress & worry or emotional factors (df['T0_C7'] > 3) | (df['T0_C8'] > 3)

Completely_Explained.label: Diagnosis recoded to Completely Explained binary

T1and2_HCData.label: T1 and T2 CGI Data present

T1_poorCGI.label: T1 CGI - Much worse, worse or not changed

T1_poorIPS.label: T1 IPS - Much worse, worse or not changed

T2_poorCGI.label: T2 CGI - Much worse, worse or not changed

T2_poorIPS.label: T2 IPS - Much worse, worse or not changed

T2_strictPoorCGI.label: T2 CGI - Much worse or worse

T2_strictPoorIPS.label: T2 IPS - Much worse or worse

T2_ternaryCGI.label: T2 CGI - Much worse or worse

T2_ternaryIPS.label: T2 IPS - Much worse or worse

ExpGroups_bin*T0_IncapacityBenefitorDLA.label: Interaction Term - Expgroups & Incapacity Benefit or DLA
valuelabels: Not Explained & In Receipt of DLA

ExpGroups_bin*T0_NegExpectation.label: Interaction Term - Expgroups & Negative Expectation of Recovery

ExpGroups_bin*T0_LackofPsychAttribution.label: Interaction Term - Expgroups & Lack of Psychological Attribution
valuelabels: Not Explained & Lack of Psych Attribution

ExpGroups_bin*T0_SIMD04_bin.label: Interaction Term - Expgroups & SIMD Quintile
valuelabels: Not Explained & Most Deprived Post Code

Diagnosis*T0_IncapacityBenefitorDLA.label: Interaction Term - Expgroups & Incapacity Benefit or DLA
valuelabels: Not in Receipt of DLA & ANY Diagnosis
In Receipt of DLA & ANY Diagnosis=Not At All

ExpGroups_bin*T0_SF12_PF_BinInt.label: Interaction Term - Expgroups & Ordinal Encoded SF12 PF Scores
